name: garlicss
description: GarliCSS ðŸ§„ is an SCSS library.
author: Oscar Alfonso Guerrero NuÃ±ez

scripts.publish: npm publish; git checkout docs; git merge main --strategy-option ours; npm run doc; git add .; git commit -m "Auto-update docs site"; git push; git checkout main
scripts.build: sass src/default/index.scss dist/style.css --no-source-map; sass src/default/index.scss dist/style.min.css --no-source-map --style=compressed -q
